name: Victory of the Shadow Riders (Skill Card)
skill_activation:
At the start of the Duel, place this card face-down in your center Spell & Trap Zone.
You draw 1 less card at the beginning of the Duel.
At the start of your first turn of the Duel, flip this card over.
skill_effect:
When this Skill is activated, add 1 "Uria, Lord of Searing Flames", "Hamon, Lord of Striking Thunder", or "Raviel, Lord of Phantasms" from your Deck to your hand.
Once per turn, you can discard 1 card, then Special Summon 1 Fiend monster with 0 ATK/DEF from your GY.
